evaluation package

Submodules

evaluation.evaluation module

evaluation.evaluation.evaluate_model(model, val_loader, save_path=None)[source]
evaluation.evaluation.plot_training_curves(train_metrics_list, val_metrics_list, metric_names=None, figsize=(15, 10), smooth_factor=0.2, best_marker=True, title=None, save_path=None)[source]

Plot training/validation metrics with smoothing and annotations.

Args:

train_metrics_list: List of dicts (per epoch) of training metrics val_metrics_list: List of dicts (per epoch) of validation metrics metric_names: Which metrics to plot (None=plot all) smooth_factor: Exponential moving average smoothing (0-1) best_marker: Whether to mark best validation values title: Plot title save_path: If provided, saves plot to this path

evaluation.evaluation.visualize_predictions_v2(model, dataset, num_samples=3, random_seed=None, save_path=None)[source]
